detectors.description:
Reentrancy in ETHToken.redeem(uint256) ():
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_value)() ()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balanceOf[msg.sender] -= _value ()
	ETHToken.balanceOf () can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- ETHToken.fallback() ()
	- ETHToken.redeem(uint256) ()
	- ETHToken.transfer(address,uint256) ()
	- ETHToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) ()
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [ETHToken.redeem(uint256)]():
	External calls:
	- [msg.sender.call.value(_value)()]()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [balanceOf[msg.sender] -= _value]()
	[ETHToken.balanceOf]() can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- [ETHToken.fallback()]()
	- [ETHToken.redeem(uint256)]()
	- [ETHToken.transfer(address,uint256)]()
	- [ETHToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256)]()
